00020 StaticObject::StaticObject(GameManager* gameManager, std::string path,
00021                            tbe::Matrix4f matrix = tbe::Matrix4f()) : Object(gameManager)
00022 {
00023     m_matrix = matrix;
00024 
00025     Open(path);
00026 
00027     Material::Array materials = GetAllMaterial();
00028 
00029     for(unsigned i = 0; i < materials.size(); i++)
00030         materials[i]->Enable(Material::BACKFACE_CULL);
00031 
00032     m_physicBody->BuildTreeNode(m_hardwareBuffer.GetAllFace());
00033 }
00034 
00035 Object* StaticObject::CloneToObject()
00036 {
00037     StaticObject* so = new StaticObject(m_gameManager, m_filename, m_matrix);
00038     m_gameManager->RegisterStatic(so);
00039     return so;
00040 }

00042 void StaticObject::OutputConstruction(std::iostream& stream)
00043 {
00044     using namespace std;
00045 
00046     stream << "+node" << endl;
00047     stream << "type=STATIC" << endl;
00048     stream << "matrix=" << m_matrix << endl;
00049     stream << "modelPath=" << m_filename << endl;
00050     stream << endl;
00051 }
